buy.descriptionMd:
Take the full advantage of the whitewater.guide for {{region}}
- Detailed sections descriptions
- Navigate to put-ins/take-outs with just one tap
- Copy coordinates of put-ins, take-outs and extra points
- Download data for offline use

alreadyHave.message: It seems that you already have your premium access to {{region}}

auth.user: Success! Please continue to your purchase

success.body: Now you have access to all premium features in {{region}}

errors.savePurchase: Failed to save your purchase. Please contact us. Your transaction id was {{transactionId}}.

errors.alreadyOwned: It appears that you have already purchased this region. Please sign out and then sign in under account that you used to purchase it. Your transaction id was {{transactionId}}.

number.max: Must be less than or equal to {{ max }}

welcome.title: Hi {{ user }}!
welcome.description_unverified: We've sent you a verification e-mail. Verification is only required if you want to purchase premium regions or create content. You can always send new verification e-mail from your account screen.

verification.menuMessage: You need to verify your account in order to purchase regions and create content

anon.description: In order to purchase premium region you must sign in first.

unverified.description:
In order to purchase premium region you must verify your account.

After you registered, we've sent you an e-mail with verification link. In case you haven't received it, you can request another e-mail.

verified.description: Your account is verified. You can now proceed to your purchase.
